summary: Comprehensive testing of OneFam family tree application completed successfully. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend issues with Select components were identified and fixed. All core functionality including login, family management, member management, tree/cards views, alerts, events calendar, and mobile responsiveness are working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: SelectItem components had empty string values causing React errors
ui_bugs.resolution: Changed empty string values to meaningful strings ('root', 'all', 'none') and updated logic accordingly

passed_tests: Universal login with credentials (username: onefam, password: Welcome1)
Dashboard - create new family
Dashboard - view families list
Dashboard - delete family
Family View - add family member with all fields
Family View - edit family member
Family View - delete family member
Family View - toggle between tree view and cards view
Tree View - proper hierarchy display with parent-child relationships
Tree View - visual connector lines between family members
Cards View - display all members in grid format
Alerts Panel - display upcoming birthdays and anniversaries
Alerts Panel - send email notifications feature
Events Calendar - add custom event
Events Calendar - filter events by month
Events Calendar - filter events by year
Events Calendar - display birthdays, anniversaries, and custom events
Events Calendar - delete custom event
Mobile responsiveness - test on smaller viewports
Photo upload and display in member cards
Logout functionality
All backend API endpoints (15/15 tests passed)
